name: atomic-crm
tagline: A lightweight customer relationship manager for tracking contacts and interactions
description: Atomic CRM is a lightweight customer relationship manager built on React Admin. It allows companies to centralize customer data, track interactions, and support automation workflows with an open-source backend.

features.title: Customer Management
features.description: Centralize all customer data and interactions. Complete CRM

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Automate repetitive CRM tasks. Save time

features.title: Contact Database
features.description: Organize customers with detailed profiles. Know your clients

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over customer data. Privacy guaranteed
